name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Selfish of a Rough Stone【#星街すいせい４周年LIVE 】 [RDHf9Tmdvpk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance for 'Selfish of a Rough Stone'.
MC section where Hoshimachi Suisei thanks the audience and prepares for the next segment.
Intermission transition with a black screen and atmospheric sounds.
Performance of the song 'U' in a church-like setting with a new outfit.

subtitles.original: 本当の自分わかるんだ、でもさ
subtitles.english: I understand my true self, but you see...

subtitles.original: また聖なる世界夢見てるの
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming of a holy world again

subtitles.original: 美しさはもろいものよ、多分
subtitles.english: Beauty is a fragile thing, perhaps

subtitles.original: あなたとあなたと私達
subtitles.english: You and you and us

subtitles.original: 無垢なままでいられない
subtitles.english: We can't remain innocent

subtitles.original: 聖なる世界夢見てるの
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming of a holy world

subtitles.original: 白い翼を背負いたいの
subtitles.english: I want to carry white wings on my back

subtitles.original: でもあなたとあなたと私達
subtitles.english: But you and you and us

subtitles.original: 無垢なままでいられない
subtitles.english: We can't remain innocent

subtitles.original: この退屈な世界を渡るには
subtitles.english: To cross this boring world

subtitles.original: 力を合わせなきゃだめよ、ほら
subtitles.english: We must join forces, look

subtitles.original: 私とあなたと私なら
subtitles.english: If it's me and you and I

subtitles.original: やってきた奇跡が起きちゃうね
subtitles.english: A miracle will surely happen

subtitles.original: だけど今は、我慢しようか、至福の時
subtitles.english: But for now, shall we be patient for the blissful moment?

subtitles.original: タイミング待ってる
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for the timing

subtitles.original: いつかどこか、私とあなた
subtitles.english: Someday, somewhere, you and I

subtitles.original: 出会うはずでしょ、明日を奪う
subtitles.english: Are supposed to meet, aren't we? Stealing tomorrow

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、本日は星街すいせい 4周年LIVEに
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you very much for coming to the

subtitles.original: お越しいただき、誠にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Hoshimachi Suisei 4th Anniversary Live today.

subtitles.original: えー、星街すいせい 4周年LIVEで、
subtitles.english: Um, please tweet using the hashtag

subtitles.original: ぜひハッシュタグをつけてツイートしてください。
subtitles.english: for the Hoshimachi Suisei 4th Anniversary Live.

subtitles.original: それでは、本日はたくさん歌って参りますので、
subtitles.english: Well then, I'll be singing a lot today, so

subtitles.original: 次のステージへ、そして次の衣装へ、
subtitles.english: I'd like to change for the next stage

subtitles.original: 着替えたいと思います。
subtitles.english: and the next outfit.

subtitles.original: うんとこしょっと。じゃあ。
subtitles.english: Heave-ho. See you then.

subtitles.original:
U
作詞/作曲 : 常田 大希
subtitles.english:
U
Lyrics/Composition: Daiki Tsuneta

subtitles.original: La la lai, la la lai
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない名も無い今を駆け抜けて行くの
subtitles.english: Running through a nameless present that no one knows

subtitles.original: 火に翳し消えて 手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Fading in the flames, reaching out my hand

subtitles.original: La la lai, la la lai
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai

subtitles.original: 君を知りたい 声にならない臆病さを
subtitles.english: I want to know you, the wordless cowardice

subtitles.original: 抱いたまま 迎えようとも
subtitles.english: Even if I welcome it while holding onto it

subtitles.original: 不揃いな感情の火 消えたその時
subtitles.english: The fire of uneven emotions, when it went out

subtitles.original: 世界と逸れてしまったみたいだ
subtitles.english: It's as if I got separated from the world

subtitles.original: 目に映る景色が 哀しく笑うなら
subtitles.english: If the scenery in your eyes smiles sadly

subtitles.original: 火照り詰まる 瞳を閉じてごらん
subtitles.english: Try closing your flushed eyes

subtitles.original: さあ皆さんこちらへどうぞ 鼓動鳴る方へさ
subtitles.english: Come this way everyone, towards the beating heart

subtitles.original: 踵打ち鳴らせどうぞ 心の踊る方へさ
subtitles.english: Stamp your heels, towards where your heart dances

subtitles.original: 蜃気楼に飛び乗って 逆しまな世界 乗りこなして
subtitles.english: Jump on the mirage, master this upside-down world

subtitles.original: La la lai, la la lai
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai

subtitles.original: 止まない愛を知りたい 願う間違い
subtitles.english: I want to know the unending love, the wishing mistake

subtitles.original: 時を超えて 朝から夜まで
subtitles.english: Crossing time from morning until night

subtitles.original: La la lai, la la lai
subtitles.english: La la lai, la la lai

subtitles.original: 君を知りたい 何一つ見逃さぬように
subtitles.english: I want to know you, so as not to miss a single thing

subtitles.original: 時は誰も待ってくれないの
subtitles.english: Time waits for no one

subtitles.original: 残酷な運命が 抗えぬ宿命が
subtitles.english: Is it cruel fate or irresistible destiny?

subtitles.original: 考える間も無く押し寄せ 刹那を鳴らして
subtitles.english: It rushes in instantly, making a sound in the moment

subtitles.original: 前が見えなくたって 君を信じてみたいの
subtitles.english: Even if I can't see ahead, I want to believe in you

subtitles.original: 恐れずに一歩踏み出したら
subtitles.english: If you take a step without fear...
